src:
Cannabisbolaget rusar på nyheter om ny leverantör
Det danska cannabisbolaget Stenocare hade noll i omsättning under det tredje kvartalet 2019 efter en leverantörsskandal. Nu meddelar bolaget att de hittat en ny odlare. Aktien stiger 10,5 procent på danska Spotlight.
07 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Marianne Agazzi, Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Cannabis company rushes on news of new supplier
Danish cannabis company Stenocare had zero sales in the third quarter of 2019 following a supplier scandal. Now the company announces that they have found a new grower. The share rises 10.5 percent on Danish Spotlight.
07 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Marianne Agazzi, News Agency Direct
